last_episode_to_air.name: The Box
last_episode_to_air.overview: Will Dawn discover the truth in time to stop the killer… or become his final victim?

name: Them
overview: A limited anthology series that explores terror in America.

seasons.name: The Covenant
seasons.overview: The Emorys move to Compton, but Palmer Drive isn’t what it seems.

seasons.name: The Scare
seasons.overview: It's 1991, and LAPD Homicide Detective Dawn Reeve is assigned to a new case: the gruesome murder of a foster home mother that has left even the most hardened detectives shaken. Navigating a tumultuous time in Los Angeles, with a city on the razor's edge of chaos, Dawn is determined to stop the killer. But as she draws closer to the truth, something ominous and malevolent grips her and her family…

episodes.name: DAY 3
episodes.overview: Henry goes to work. Ruby goes to school. Lucky and Gracie go to the hardware store. Lucky bakes a pie.

episodes.name: DAY 4
episodes.overview: Henry surprises the girls. Lucky goes to Hazel’s. Betty makes an impression. Lucky takes the bus.

episodes.name: DAY 6
episodes.overview: Lucky visits Helen. Henry gets good news. Ruby and Doris share a secret. Lucky meets Ella Mae.

episodes.name: COVENANT I.
episodes.overview: Helen goes to work. The Emorys leave North Carolina.

episodes.name: DAY 7: MORNING
episodes.overview: Lucky does Gracie’s hair. Henry has a beer with a new friend. Ruby tries out. Betty phones a friend.

episodes.name: DAY 7: NIGHT
episodes.overview: Henry goes for a walk. Betty visits George. Hazel visits Lucky. Henry makes a discovery.

episodes.name: DAY 9
episodes.overview: Marty and Earl have a chat. George makes chicken dinner. Henry and the girls come home.

1.name: The Covenant
1.overview: The Emorys move to Compton, but Palmer Drive isn’t what it seems.

episodes.name: Are You Scared?
episodes.overview: LAPD Homicide Detective Dawn Reeve investigates a gruesome murder in a foster home. It already feels like she’s bringing her case home with her. Meanwhile, Edmund Gaines, a struggling actor, pursues a new role… and a new friend.

episodes.name: The Devil Himself Visited This Place
episodes.overview: Dawn’s investigation unearths a gruesome discovery. Kel is woken by a strange broadcast. Edmund gets his first taste of attention.

episodes.name: The Man With the Red Hair
episodes.overview: Dawn gets her first description of the killer. Edmund has a big audition.

episodes.name: Happy Birthday, Sweet Boy
episodes.overview: Dawn discovers a shocking family secret. Edmund surprises someone from his past, sending him on a dangerous spiral.

episodes.name: Luke 8:17
episodes.overview: A shocking phone call sends Edmund past the point of no return. Dawn follows an unexpected lead that brings her closer than ever to the killer.

episodes.name: Would You Like to Play a Game?
episodes.overview: Dawn becomes the target of her own investigation. The killer sets his sights on Kel.

episodes.name: One of Us Is Gonna Die Tonight
The Box
episodes.overview: Will Dawn discover the truth in time to stop the killer… or become his final victim?

2.overview: It's 1991, and LAPD Homicide Detective Dawn Reeve is assigned to a new case: the gruesome murder of a foster home mother that has left even the most hardened detectives shaken. Navigating a tumultuous time in Los Angeles, with a city on the razor's edge of chaos, Dawn is determined to stop the killer. But as she draws closer to the truth, something ominous and malevolent grips her and her family…
